title: Mage Ahri
body:
So, I realize this is a bit of a niche topic, but does no-one think mage Ahri is viable? I'm looking at some pros to get tips and tricks (As she is one of the only mids I can decently play) And it seems like all of them focus almost solely on her assassin-like side

Also, I'm not talking about LCS and stuff play, I just mean Diamond above kinda stuff. Granted she doesn't have the aoe cc of say, Syndra or Talyia but she seems like a much safer pick then most of them, all while being to output similar damage as safe ranges.

Is there just an issue i'm not seeing with her that prevents this, or? If you have any opinions about the matter, please comment
